title: THE MAN FROM UNCLE FONT
content:
PLEASE COULD YOU HELP ME LOCATE THE FONT OR A SIMILAR FONT USED FOR THE TV PROGRAM THE MAN FROM UNCLE'S LOGO .

THANK YOU  
JF

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [uncle311.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218044809/http:/typophile.com/files/uncle311.jpg) | 27.78 KB |
author: JEWELTHIEF

comments.content:
This looks like 'Profile'.

PS\> Why are you screaming at us?

This is a scan from 'Homage to the Alphabet', as I am not aware of any digital versions.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218044809im_/http:/typophile.com/files/profile_5748.jpg)

THANK YOU  
FOR SUCH A PROMPT RESPONSE

JF
The original foundry type name is Profil.

Jonathan, you're a new user here, and welcome, but please release your caps lock and type in 'normal' letters. All caps is considered 'shouting'. There's no need for that.

- Mike Yanega
